articles.author: Glynn A. Hill
articles.title: Last-minute Spanish goal ousts host Germany in dramatic Euro 2024 finish - The Washington Post
articles.description: A crop of dynamic young talent has Spain set to face France in the European Championship semifinals.
articles.content:
Mikel Merino sent Spain into the Euro 2024 semifinals in dramatic fashion Friday, heading in the game-winning goal late in extra time to eliminate host Germany, 2-1, in Stuttgart.
Spain will face Fr… [+4041 chars]
